activities.name: com.simplemobiletools.dialer.activities.SimpleActivity
activities.summary: This activity serves as the main entry point for the Dialer application, providing UI elements to navigate to different functionalities such as configuration and the main dialer interface.

activities.name: com.simplemobiletools.dialer.activities.ManageSpeedDialActivity

dynamic_properties.effect: Provides structure for material design components like AppBarLayout and FloatingActionButton, enabling scroll behavior and layout coordination.
Displays the title 'Manage speed dial' and provides a navigation icon (Arrow) to go back to the previous screen.
Enables vertical scrolling of the main content inside the activity, ensuring all elements are accessible regardless of screen size.
Holds child views such as instructional text and the list of speed dial items for vertical arrangement.

static_properties.text: Click on a number to assign a contact to it. You can then quickly call the given contact by long pressing the given number at the dialer.

dynamic_properties.effect: Shows instructions to guide the user on how to assign contacts to speed dial slots by clicking on them.
Displays a list of speed dial slots where each can be clicked to open a dialog for associating a contact and optionally selecting a phone number from multiple options.

activities.summary: This activity is used to manage speed dial entries in a dialer application, allowing users to assign specific contacts and phone numbers to predefined speed dial slots. It supports features such as retrieving device contacts, selecting associated contacts for each slot, persisting configurations, and dynamically updating the UI based on user interactions.

activities.name: com.simplemobiletools.dialer.activities.DialerActivity
activities.summary: This activity is responsible for initiating outgoing phone calls. It checks if the number is blocked, verifies if the app is set as the default dialer, and uses TelecomManager to place the call. If the app is not set as the default, it prompts the user to set it through settings.

activities.name: com.simplemobiletools.dialer.activities.CallActivity
activities.summary: This activity manages incoming and ongoing calls, allowing users to accept or decline calls, toggle microphone/speaker, show dialpad, manage call hold, merge or swap calls, and adjust audio routes. It also handles UI transitions for different call states, such as ringing, on hold, and active call.

activities.name: com.simplemobiletools.dialer.activities.SplashActivity
activities.summary: The SplashActivity is typically used as a starting screen for the app, which may perform initial setup or display branding before navigating to the main functionality of the application.

activities.name: com.simplemobiletools.dialer.activities.SettingsActivity

static_properties.text: Enable vibrations on dialpad button clicks
Enable beeps on dialpad button clicks
Open the dialpad by default when the app opens
Group subsequent calls with the same number at the call log
Replace swiping at responding to incoming calls with clicking
Always display incoming calls on full screen

activities.summary: This activity is used for managing application settings, including UI customization, call settings, language preferences, import/export options, and blocked numbers management.

activities.name: com.simplemobiletools.dialer.activities.MainActivity

dynamic_properties.effect: Serves as the root layout container that coordinates child views including AppBarLayout, ViewPager, and floating action buttons.
Displays and manages search functionality and overflow menu items specific to the current fragment or screen context.
Hosts the main content area of the activity including the ViewPager and FloatingActionButton.
Manages swiping between fragments (Contacts, Favorites, Recents) and maintains their state.
Launches the DialpadActivity where users can manually input phone numbers.

activities.summary: The MainActivity serves as the primary interface for a dialer application, providing tab-based navigation between different sections such as Contacts, Favorites, and Call History. It handles permissions, fragment management, UI customization, dynamic shortcuts, and user interactions like sorting, filtering, and changing view settings. It also manages app state during lifecycle events and configuration changes.

activities.name: com.simplemobiletools.dialer.activities.ConferenceActivity
activities.summary: This activity is used for managing and displaying a list of conference calls with appropriate UI components and navigation.

activities.name: com.simplemobiletools.dialer.activities.DialpadActivity
activities.summary: The DialpadActivity provides a dialer interface for users to input phone numbers, search contacts, initiate calls, manage speed dials, and handle special dialer codes. It supports haptic feedback, audible tones, contact filtering, locale-specific character mapping, and multiple SIM call handling.
